solution.text:
Surface Area = Curved surface area of outer cylinder + Curved surface area of inner cylinder + Area of both rims
\(= 2\pi {r_ o}h + 2\pi {r_ i}h + 2\pi ({r_ o}^2 - {r_ i}^2)\)
\(= _{{2*22*(j+2)*k}}_ + _{{2*22*j*k}}_ + _{{trunc( 2*pi_val*(((j+2)**2) - (j**2)), 2 )}}_ = _{{(2*22*(j+2+j)*k) + trunc( 2*pi_val*(((j+2)**2) - (j**2)), 2 )}}_ cm^2\)

content.text: In the hollow cylinder below, Inner Radius =_{j}_ cm, Outer Radius = _{{j+2}}_ cm, Height = _{{k*7}}_ cm, find its surface area
